participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, she enjoys meeting new people and has a vibrant spirit.
participant_1.background: i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i do not like chicken.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Introverted and eccentric, he prefers to spend time alone, often lost in his thoughts or projects.
participant_2.background: i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse.

content.text: Good to see you! i like to read and write. i love it.
What year was an apartment for chopin's apartment?
